akalanka ranasinha (nayaka), samira rathnayaka (upa nayaka), iresh kosala, nilanka karunarathna, sampath ruwan kumara, asanka lakmal, lasantha sanjiwa, charith hapuaarachchi, sanjiwa jayarathna, aruna shantha, sandun madusanka, tharindu madumal, saliya anuradha, awishka gunasekara, subhash gunasiri, nawin anuradha, kaushalya prabuddha saha ashan wirasekara dinesh perera kandayam kalamanakaru lesa katayuthu kala athara, pradhana puhunukaru lesa katayuthu kale milindu hewageya.

uu ithin ara loku ekkena kapapu kellage katayamata un gawa thibba raththaran mala mudu karambau serama palannduwalu.ita passe uu nidagaththama thun weni ekkena mura karanna aawalu.uutath ara wagema nidimathak aawalu.uu ithin ra eli wenakan igenagaththa shilpa walin manthara japa karala ara kellage katayamata pana dunnalu.ita passe un ee kellawath aragena raja maligawata giyalu.ita passe ithin un thun denama rajathumagen illuwalu ee kellawa banndala denna kiyala.loku ekkena kiwwalu man thama nikanma nikan kotayak kellek wage kale eeka nisa mata banndala denna kiyala.dewaniya kiwwalu man thama ee kellata raththaran muthu palanndawala lassana kale eeka nisa mata banndala denna kiyala.thun weniya kiwwalu man pana dunne nathnam thamath ee kella nikanma nikan katayamak witharayi eeka nisa mata banndala denna kiyala.ithin rajathuma amathilagenuth ahala eka puthekta ee kellawa banndala dunnalu.kawuda ee putha.ayi ee puthata banndala dunne.?
